post.summary: Add carrier relationships to a broker.
post.description: This endpoint adds carrier relationships to the broker with the supplied id.

requestBody.description: The carrier relationships to be added to the broker.

204.description: The carrier relationships have been added.

delete.summary: Delete carrier relationships from a broker.
delete.description: This endpoint deletes carrier relationships from the broker with the supplied id.

requestBody.description: The carrier relationships to be deleted from the broker.

204.description: The contract relationships have been deleted.
